mic_disabled.command: new UiSelector().description("Push to talk button is disabled. To enable, turn on walkie-talkie.")
mic_disabled.xpath: //android.widget.Button[@content-desc='Push-to-talk button is disabled. To enable, turn on walkie-talkie.']
mic_disabled.xpath1: //android.widget.Button[@content-desc="Push to talk button is disabled. To enable, turn on walkie-talkie."]/android.widget.ImageView

mic_enabled.command: new UiSelector().description("Push to talk. Double-tap and hold to talk.")
mic_enabled.xpath: //android.widget.Button[@content-desc='Push to talk button. Double tap and hold to talk. Release to stop.']

participants_icon.xpath: //android.widget.Button[@content-desc='Open list of people who are connected']

mic_double_tap_error_pop.xpath: //android.widget.TextView[@text='You need to wait a bit before you tap and hold to talk.']

mic_while_speaking.command: new UiSelector().description("Push to talk button is disabled.")

no_one_is_connected.command: new UiSelector().textContains("No one else is connected")

can_not_use_the_app_while_in_call.command: new UiSelector().textContains("You can't use the app while in a Teams call or meeting.")

DND_error_message.command: new UiSelector().textContains("Suppressing messages while youâ€™re on Do Not Disturb.")
